featured.name: Librería de Animación para Rich Media (Crazyvity):
featured.description: The designers asked for an easier way to make rich media ads campaigns without programming. Besides rich media platforms as DoubleClick and Sizmek have a 100Kbs. limitation per ad, so I made a Vanilla JS library; that anyone can easily use to make animated interactive ads, automatizing their work even if they didn’t know anything about coding.

featured.name: Fan del Mes (Travel Club):
featured.description: Our client Travel Club asked for a way to measure their Facebook user interactions. I developed a Javascript app using Vanilla JS and jQuery for their Facebook profile using its API. A cron job made in PHP to retrieve the feeds of all the users that interacted with the app using the Facebook API. I also create an admin panel for the client to easily use the application.
